version_description:
+ Added support for iPhone 6 and 6+
+ Added 1/25s shutter speed option
+ Bug fixes

+ New camera roll, integrated into the viewfinder for faster workflow
+ Added Light Painting mode, with innovative Live Preview, 2 unique submodes
+ Added bracketing modes for exposure, ISO, and shutter
+ Added bracketing frame count
+ Added 4K video (on supported devices)
+ Added 4K timelapse (on supported devices)
+ Added full manual controls to front camera
+ Added support for retina flash on front camera
+ Added video shortcut button
+ Added toggle to video stabilization
+ Added toggle for image stabilization (on supported devices)
+ Added a toggle for GPS
+ Added a toggle for UI sounds
+ Added a battery indicator
+ Increased timelapse video quality, up to 100 Mbits/s
+ Can now show / hide EXIF by long-pressing the screen
+ Major improvements to UI and UX - zoom, controls, everything
+ Various bug fixes

+ Fixed Light Painting bug
+ Fixed battery meter bugs
+ Stability improvements

+ Added a new AE lock feature (tap the new AE button)
+ Focus and exposure targets can now be dragged anywhere on the screen (tap them to reset)
+ The button next to the main camera button now takes still photos during video
+ Improved auto ISO and auto shutter algorithm (faster, more reliable, stable)
+ Fixed volume shutter bug
+ UI improvements and various bug fixes

+ Updated UI for better visibility and usability
+ Dozens of small improvements
+ Fixed all known bugs

+ Added date / time info back to the camera roll
+ UI fixes
+ Bug fixes

+ New camera roll: updated UI, added RGB + Luma histogram and video bitrate info
+ Improved usability: made viewfinder buttons larger and easier to press
+ Expanded manual WB values to 2250-9000K
+ Fixed video bug where incorrect FPS was selected
+ Added workaround for time-lapse video issue affecting some devices
+ Lots of small improvements and tweaks throughout the UI
+ Random small bug fixes
+ Thank you so much everyone for the reports and positive feedback!

Big update!

+ Updated image capture pipeline for iOS10
+ Added support for RAW/DNG. Compatible devices with iOS10 can now shoot in JPEG, RAW and RAW+JPEG
+ RAW can be used with Normal, BKT (bracket) and burst modes
+ Added RAW support to ProShot’s camera roll
+ Added support for wide color capture
+ Added audio input level meter during video capture
+ Made UI buttons bigger and easier to press
+ Fixed bug where timelapse videos wouldn’t save
+ Fixed bug where front camera image might be blank
+ Many other small UI tweaks and bug fixes

Thank you all for your love and support!

+ Fixed a crash while taking RAW photos
+ A few minor bug fixes
+ Thank you everyone for the feedback!

+ Fixed bugs with iPhone7
+ Fixed a bug with RAW

+ New Camera UI
+ New Camera Roll UI
+ Added button to settings panel to reset UI color

Everything. We've rebuilt ProShot from the ground up and seasoned it with a bold new design. If you like lists, here's a list of what's new in our biggest update ever:

+ Added Live Photo support
+ Added Monochrome mode
+ Added AUTO MAX ISO option
+ Added AUTO MAX Shutter option
+ Added battery level indicator
+ Added disk space remaining indicator
+ Added dedicated slo-mo mode
+ Added ability to swap lenses
+ Added portrait mode
+ Added Live Photo + light painting mode
+ Added ability to export a single JPEG or DNG from a RAW+JPEG file
+ Added camera roll support for favoriting photos
+ Added camera roll support for video scrubbing
+ Added real-time white balance information
+ Added focus confirmation indicator
+ Sweet new design
+ New Grid types
+ Added haptic feedback to UI (Live Photo needs to be off for haptics, its an API issue)
+ Improved volume button support
+ Added iPhone X support
+ Improved iPad support

If you're enjoying this update, please don't forget to leave us a review!

Happy filming,
ProShot Team

Supplemental update to 5.0 that brings a lot of small changes to make for a better, smoother experience.

+ Added labels to camera settings for clarity
+ Added scroll indicators to ISO and shutter menu
+ Increased the size of some buttons that were too small
+ Added link to our online user guide (Settings panel > tap the 3 dots)
+ Fixed ISO and shutter settings when only one of them is set to auto
+ Improved left-handed usability
+ Fixed iPad layout issues
+ Many other small changes and improvements to the UI
+ Bug fixes

v5.0
Everything. We've rebuilt ProShot from the ground up and seasoned it with a bold new design. If you like lists, here's a list of what's new in our biggest update ever:
+ Added Live Photo support

+ Added ability to export a single JPEG or DNG from a RAW+JPEG file

Another update already? Yep. Lots of good stuff in here.

• Added histogram with 4 different visualizations
• Added .DNG (RAW) bracketing
• Fixed a crash in portrait mode
• Fixed some localization issues
• Improved exposure algorithm
• Improved usage while rotation lock is on
• Improved iPad compatibility
• Many tiny fixes here and there

If you're enjoying ProShot, please don't forget to leave us a review :)

Love,
ProShot Team

Some minor cleanup to make for a smoother experience.

• Bug fixes
• UI adjustments
• Added URI scheme back

Many bug fixes and improvements in this update for both photo and video.

• Improved exposure algorithm
• Improved low light performance
• Improved image capture speed
• Increased auto max shutter options up to 1/30s
• Fixed a rare crash when switching between camera modes
• Fixed a rare crash when taking a photo
• Fixed pinch to zoom gesture
• Fixed a bug where manual controls weren't used when taking a photo
• Fixed a bug that prevented RAW files from being shared
• Fixed a bug that occurred when swiping to the camera roll after image capture
• Fixed a... wait why are you still reading this list? Go out and take some photos :)

• fixed a bug where certain camera values weren't being set
• fixed a crash during startup
• fixed a crash during bracket photo sequence
• performance improvements

-- Huge Optimization Update --

A ton of behind-the-scenes work has gone into this update to make ProShot load and run faster than ever before. Up to 30% faster launch times.
Also included are the following:

• A rare crash has been patched
• Live Photo bug fixes
• Camera roll bug fixes
• Design adjustments and various UI bug fixes

• Fixed an issue with volume buttons
• Increased max file size and duration for video
• Bug fixes

• Added 1/100 and 1/300 shutter speed options
• Improved camera roll image preview resolution
• Bug fixes

A little bit of spring cleaning!

• UI fixes
• Bug fix for point focus
• Performance improvements

If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a review :)

• Added 100fps option to slomo mode
• Added new UI colors
• UI updates
• Performance improvements and faster startup

If you're enjoying ProShot, please don't forget to write us a nice review! :)
• Several bug fixes to improve app stability and performance

Lots of little fixes in this update to help polish the experience!

• Switching to portrait mode is now much faster
• Bug fixes to portrait mode to improve stability
• Improved permissions handling
• Enhancements to auto mode when in low light
• UI/UX bug fixes
• Fixes for some rare crashes

If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a nice review :)

Many small fixes to make for a smoother, more stable experience.

• Redesigned the horizon level function
• Bug fixes for bracketing
• Bug fixes for RAW capture
• Several little UI adjustments and fixes

If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a review!

Love,
ProShot Team

• Added FPS options for timelapse video
• Bug fixes

We're always working hard to bring new features to ProShot. If you're enjoying our app, please don't forget to leave us a nice review! :)

iOS 13 update! Lots of small things in here to ensure ProShot runs smoothly on the newest OS release.

• New dark camera roll
• Fixes for some layout issues
• Fixes for some rare crashes
• Fix for volume button behavior
• Adjustments to haptics

iPhone 11 / Pro support coming soon!

• A small patch for the most recent update

iPhone 11 / Pro support coming soon!

iPhone 11 / Pro update!

• Added support for the dual and triple cameras for iPhone 11 and iPhone 11 Pro
• Portrait mode now supported for wide lens on iPhone 11 and both wide and tele lenses on iPhone 11 Pro
• Bug fixes for Portrait Mode
• Bug fixes for volume button

Introducing ProShot v6.0!
• New: Menus get a new design, replaced the dials with easy access buttons
• New: Added noise reduction setting (Off / Auto)
• New: Added time-lapse calculator in time-lapse menu (when duration is set)
• Improvements to Light Painting mode
• Rotation lock fix
• Portrait mode fix
• Localization fixes
• Lots of other little fixes

If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a review :)

This update focuses on video and polishes up a few things:

• New! High bitrate video, up to 80Mb/s. Improves image quality and dynamic range. Caution: large file sizes
• New! Added video stabilization toggle (on / off)
• Improved behavior of P and M modes
• Lots of small usability fixes

If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a nice review! Thank you! :)

• Added manual focus assist hint
• Some small UI updates
• Bug fixes for portrait mode and video

The dials are back! You asked for 'em, and we listened :)

• Option to toggle between camera dials and camera buttons available in the Settings menu
• Added more theme colors
• Improved how camera modes operate
• Many bug fixes and performance improvements for iPhone and iPad

Lots of good stuff in this update!

• Added 3:2 aspect ratio
• Added burst capture (press and hold camera button)
• Added a shortcut to the Photos app in the camera roll
• Video modes now show the correct aspect ratio prior to recording
• LivePhotos save quicker using iOS 13.3 and higher
• Added new permissions page for first time users
• Tons of little bug fixes and improvements

If you're enjoying ProShot please let us know by leaving a kind review :)

This update brings polish to various parts of the app, as well as:

• EXIF support for Light Painting
• Subtle UI changes and bug fixes
• A small improvement to Light Painting's "Stack" mode

Introducing ProShot 7.0! This update adds a massive new feature: true unlimited shutter.

Unlimited shutter (B*) extends the capture capabilities of every iOS device, while using machine learning to intelligently stabilize handheld shots. Capture night landscapes, light trails, and even the stars! Unlimited shutter is selectable from the shutter menu and works like any other shutter option, with the ability to adjust exposure and ISO however you like. Unlimited shutter even works when LivePhoto is enabled, allowing you to save a beautiful time-lapse video along with your photo!

Other highlights in this release include:

• Added compatibility with iOS 14
• UI improvements
• Increased Light Painting resolution
• Bug fixes for bracketing to better support manual controls and portrait mode
• Bug fixes for exposure in certain situations
• Many other fixes to improve the user experience

Introducing ProShot 7.0! This is a huge update that adds an incredible new feature: true unlimited shutter.

Unlimited shutter (B*) extends the capture capabilities of every iOS device, while using machine learning to intelligently stabilize handheld shots. Capture night landscapes, light trails, and even the stars! Unlimited shutter is selectable from the shutter menu and works like any other shutter option, with the ability to adjust exposure and ISO however you like. Unlimited shutter even works when LivePhoto is enabled, allowing you to save a beautiful time-lapse video along with your photo!

Other highlights in this release include:

• Added compatibility with iOS 14
• UI improvements
• Increased Light Painting resolution
• Bug fixes for bracketing to better support manual controls and portrait mode
• Bug fixes for exposure in certain situations
• Many other fixes to improve the user experience

• Added the ability to capture RAW (dng) only files, which joins the current options to capture JPEG (HEIC) and JPEG+RAW
• Several fixes throughout the app to improve stability and operation

If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a kind review! Thank you :)

A bit of housekeeping in this update. Fixed or improved quite a few things, including:

• Improved Infinite Shutter
• Fixes for Live Photo, FOV correction, and screen dimming bug
• Several smaller improvements

Thank you all for the bug reports! If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a nice review :)

Lots of little improvements, and reworked audio and haptics to better take advantage of newer OS features, including:

• Added stereo recording (for compatible devices, turns on automatically)
• Support for external music app playback
• Haptics now work when Live Photo is enabled
• Bug fixes for bracketing, RAW
• Many little UI improvements

If you're enjoying ProShot please don't forget to leave us a kind review! Thank you :)

Quick fix for a bug introduced in the last update, sorry about that!
Stay tuned, more cool stuff is on the way :)

• Bug fixes for photo bracketing and RAW capture
• Stability improvements

This update brings Apple ProRAW to ProShot, and the results are stunning. Here’s what’s new:

• Added Apple ProRAW support, as well as a reduced quality ProRAW-L option to save space
• Added the ability to shoot RAW and capture a Live Photo in the same shot
• Completely reworked viewfinder and capture code to make night shooting a breeze, resulting in easier use and clearer, better stabilized pictures
• To honor the release of Cyberpunk 2077, we added a Cyberpunk theme to ProShot :)

Enjoy!

• Zoom is now supported when shooting with ProRAW or ProRAW-L
• Fixes for RAW capture
• Fixes for the Cyberpunk 2077 theme

Patching up a few things that slipped through the cracks :)

• Fixed a bug when selecting ISO while using Infinite Shutter
• Fixed a crash with the front camera

• Added support for external mics (auto detect)
• UI fixes

This update fixes a rare crash when shooting RAW, and fixes some UI bugs.

Happy New Year to one and all! :)

This update further polishes the UI and addresses a few bugs, including:

• New zoom label
• UI updates and fixes throughout
• iPad fixes

In this update, a lot of internal changes were made to create a better and smoother experience, including:

• Improved shutter responsiveness
• Introduced a number of enhancements to improve video workflow
• Additional UI updates
• Added Russian and Turkish support

A quick update to fix some errors on the iPad, and fixes for the UI across all devices.
More good stuff on the way!

Some UI updates this week to improve camera operation, including:

• A new on-screen lens chooser
• Added an AE-Lock button, more timer options
• UI updates and fixes

This update polishes a few items, including:

• Bug fix for Infinite Shutter when Live Photo is on
• Improved camera speed

This update expands the your choice of formats for maximum compatibility, including:

• New JPEG image format option
• New H.264 / H.265 video format options*
• Bug fixes and UI improvements

*Not available on some older devices

This update polishes a few UI items, including:

• Moving video format button to on screen button
• Fixing a bug when selecting image format
This update adds a few fixes to improve stability during image capture, as well as some UI improvements.

This update adds several new features, including:

• Added torch brightness slider
• Added portrait mode support for devices with dual wide lenses
• Added option to control camera settings behavior when returning to app
• UI fixes

This update adds several new features, including:

• Added torch brightness slider
• Added portrait mode support for devices with dual wide lenses
• Added option to control camera settings behavior when returning to app (open the Camera Mode Dial to find this option)
• UI fixes

This update brings several fixes and enhancements to the UI, including:

• Added video file size info during video recording
• Multiple UI fixes and bug fixes

This update brings several fixes and enhancements to the UI, including:

• Added video file size info during video recording
• Multiple UI fixes and bug fixes

This update brings image quality and stabilization improvements to Infinite Shutter (bulb mode). Easily shoot long exposure photographs handled, or capture the stars with a tripod (or handheld, if you have the patience! :)

Additional improvements include:

• Enhanced behavior when moving between camera modes. Selecting Program or Manual mode will now auto-select ISO and Shutter Speed for convenience
• Improved Live Photo output while using Infinite Shutter
• Bug fixes for Infinite Shutter

This update brings image quality and stabilization improvements to Infinite Shutter (bulb mode). Easily shoot long exposure photographs handled, or capture the stars with a tripod (or handheld, if you have the patience! :)

Additional improvements include:

• Larger ISO and Shutter menus
• Audio positioning fix
• UI fixes to improve stability

This update brings image quality and stabilization improvements to Infinite Shutter (bulb mode). Easily shoot long exposure photographs handled, or capture the stars with a tripod (or handheld, if you have the patience! :)

Additional improvements include:

• Expanded dynamic range for Infinite Shutter (bulb) photos
• UI fixes and improvements

This updates adds several new features to ProShot, including:

• A compass overlay with altitude reading (altitude requires location permission)
• Rotation lock
• UI updates for an improved experience

This update improves compatibility with new devices such as the iPhone 13 / Pro and iPad mini, and improves support for iOS 15. Also in this update:

• A new center grid type
• Various bug fixes and UI improvements
